articles.title: Asia’s richest man Mukesh Ambani unveils $10bn green energy push - Aljazeera.com
articles.description: Indian mogul and fossil-fuel billionaire unveiled a plan to invest $10.1bn over three years in green energy.
articles.content: Indian tycoon Mukesh Ambani unveiled an ambitious push into clean energy involving 750 billion rupees ($10.1 billion) of investment over three years, marking a new pivot for one of the worlds biggest… [+5731 chars]

articles.title: China Likely To Beat The US In Manned Mission To Moon As NASA Confirms Tech Delays - EurAsian Times
articles.description: As the US, China compete to land humans on the moon, NASA’s 2024 deadline for another manned mission to the Moon looks increasingly doubtful
articles.content: As the US and China compete to land humans on the moon, NASAs 2024 deadline for another manned mission to the lunar surface looks increasingly doubtful due to a reliance on technology that has yet to… [+2439 chars]

articles.title: Former Philippine President Benigno Aquino dies in hospital at 61 - TODAYonline
articles.description: MANILA — Former Philippine President Benigno Aquino, the son of two of the Southeast Asian country's democracy icons, died on Thursday (June 24) after being hospitalised in Manila.

articles.description: $13.4 million for a Blue-Eyes White Dragon?

articles.title: Hong Kong actress Charmaine Sheh admits she almost got married, now 'observing' a potential suitor - AsiaOne
